Paragraph: The encouraging results obtained in various authoratative departments in myopathic patients by using anabolizing steroids have encouraged the authors to investigate the beneficial effects of one anabolizing agent ( Dianabol , CIBA ) at high doses in rats rendered myopathic by a diet deficient in vitamin E .

Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The encouraging results obtained in various authoratative departments in myopathic patients by using anabolizing steroids have encouraged the authors to investigate the beneficial effects of one anabolizing agent ( Dianabol , CIBA ) at high doses in rats rendered myopathic by a diet deficient in vitamin E .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| anabolizing steroids |
| Dianabol |
| CIBA (presumably a brand name for a specific form of Dianabol) |
| vitamin E |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| anabolizing steroids |
| Dianabol (CIBA) |
| vitamin E |

Note: The term "anabolizing agent" refers to a type of chemical compound, specifically steroids that promote anabolism (tissue building). Therefore, it is included in the table as "anabolizing steroids". The specific anabolizing steroid mentioned in the paragraph is "Dianabol (CIBA)".
